column4: Can someone help me with nvidia drivers and "Ubuntu is running in low graph mode"? Please

yes

goto System>Preferance>Apearance>Visual effects and chose the one u want

have u gone to system>administration>hardware drivers ?

test

al, I don't really know the difference between the chooices in the menu... But the previous worked... But How can I solve that?
hang on....
Sorry, I didn't really get it... Reinstall what? :/
I did install it after the update of the kernel. So, :'/
Ok. But now I can only start ubuntu (with good graphics) in the previous KERNEL. wHAT SHOULD i DO?
Sorry for the caps...
Because as it is now the latest kernel will be "auto started"...
Yeah, ok. (This one was the third in the list, yeah :)) But will it be "auto solved" when they reales a new kenel version?
goto synaptic package manager... look for nvidia... choose the generic modules you need.
